A better error is needed, thanks!

It looks like a null check is needed in Perspective.showView.  It calls
IWorkbenchPartReference.getPart(), which is spec'ed to return null if there was
an error restoring the view.  In this case he specified an abstract class or
interface as the view class, hence the failure to load.

Fix in Perspective.
Fixed the NPE to open a dialog to informe the user that the view could not be 
opened. The InstantiationException will still be logged because it is a problem 
in the implementation of the view that the plugin developer will have to fix.

Released to HEAD stream.
